Name: Dead Seater
About the game: You are Jesse, a man on a desperate mission to reunite his family. Explore the house and keep the lights on. Find items to unlock parts of the Vincent family residence, travelling deeper and deeper as you prepare the house for Father. You have nothing to defend yourself. Features: Unique and terrible enemies will use the house to surprise you. An intense and claustrophobic atmosphere inspired by classics. A simple narrative and visual story-telling hides a deep aftermath.
